it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp

Class DhcpMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp.DhcpMessage

  • public class DhcpMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    DhcpMessage is the base class for managing DHCP request and response messages

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte DHCP_ACK
      Ack message code = 5
      static byte DHCP_ADV
      Adv message code = 9

      Decline message code = 4
      static byte DHCP_DISCOVER
      Discover message code = 1
      static byte DHCP_INFORM
      Infrom message code = 8
      static byte DHCP_NACK
      Nack message code = 6
      static byte DHCP_OFFER
      Offer message code = 2
      static byte DHCP_RELEASE
      Release message code = 7
      static byte DHCP_REQUEST
      Request message code = 3

      Costructs an empty message

      Costructs an new message read from a DatagramSocket
